name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Professional vocalist with 10+ years of experience in live performances and studio recordings. Specializes in jazz, pop, and acoustic genres.

name: Raj Patel
bio: Award-winning DJ and music producer known for creating electrifying party atmospheres. Expert in Bollywood, EDM, and commercial music.

name: Priya Sharma
bio: Classical and contemporary dance artist with extensive experience in Bharatanatyam, hip-hop, and fusion dance styles.

name: Michael D'Souza
bio: Renowned motivational speaker and corporate trainer. Specializes in leadership development, team building, and personal growth seminars.

name: Aarav Singh
bio: Indie folk singer and guitarist known for soulful performances. Creates original compositions and covers popular songs with unique arrangements.

name: Neha Kapoor
bio: Professional female DJ and event host specializing in weddings, corporate events, and private parties. Expert in reading the crowd and creating memorable experiences.

name: Karthik Reddy
bio: Contemporary and street dance performer with expertise in breakdancing, popping, and locking. Regular participant in national dance competitions.

name: Dr. Anita Gupta
bio: Medical doctor turned wellness speaker focusing on mental health, stress management, and work-life balance. Regular speaker at corporate wellness programs.
